title: New: Luhx. – no rush
body:
This track from **luhx.**

came on whilst I was shuffling through some tracks on Soundcloud (hey, remember Soundcloud?) and had me instantly hooked. Coming in somewhere between the pop leaning songwriting of Oh Wonder and the soulfully smooth charm of HONNE, it’s a striking mark of intent. Check out _no rush_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
